creditline: The James S. Bell Memorial Fund
description: The Hardwicke Soup Tureens, originally one of a pair.
inscription:
Mark and inscription

Body and cover are engraved on either side with the arms of Philip Yorke (1690-1764), created first baron Hardwicke in 1733.
markings:
Mark

Fully marked on underisde of body.  Lion passant, date letter, and leopard\'s head crowned on bezel of cover.
title: Soup tureen
